content: import MiniSearch from 'minisearch' const tokenizer = (str) => { // åˆ†è¯é€»è¾‘ï¼Œè¿”å›å®Œæ•´çš„å•è¯ä»¥åŠå•è¯çš„éƒ¨åˆ†ç‰‡æ®µ const words = str.match(/[\u4e00-\u9fa5]+|[a-zA-Z0-9]+/g) || []; const subStrings = []; words.forEach(word => { if (/^[a-zA-Z0-9]+$/.test(word)) { // è‹±æ–‡æˆ–æ•°å­— // ç”Ÿæˆæ‰€æœ‰å¯èƒ½çš„å­ä¸² for (let i = 1; i <= word.length; i++) { subStrings.push(...word.slice(0, i)); } } else { // ä¸­æ–‡ // ç”Ÿæˆæ‰€æœ‰å¯èƒ½çš„ n-gram å­ä¸² for (let i = 1; i <= word.length; i++) { for (let j = 0; j <= word.length - i; j++) { subStrings.push(word.substring(j, j + i)); } } } }); return subStrings.filter((value, index, self) => self.indexOf(value) === index); // å»é‡ }; let miniSearch = new MiniSearch({ fields: ['name', 'description'], // æœç´¢å“ªäº›å­—æ®µ storeFields: ['name', 'description', 'url'], // è¿”å›å“ªäº›å­—æ®µ tokenize: tokenizer }) miniSearch.addAll(documents); // é…ç½®æœç´¢æº // æœç´¢ miniSearch.autoSuggest('æœç´¢è¯', { filter: (result) => { // å¤„ç†æœç´¢ç»“æœ searchData.value.push({ name: result.name, description: result.description, url: result.url }) return true } })
